mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commainboard (boardNum,subject, content, cateNum, membernum) VALUES(seq_commainboard.NEXTVAL, #{subject} , #{content} , #{cateNum} ,#{memberNum})
mapper.select: SELECT boardNum,subject,content,TO_CHAR(b.created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, hitCount,m.NAME,cateNum,email FROM commainboard b JOIN member2 m ON b.memberNum=m.membernum WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE commainboard SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
UPDATE commainboard SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
